name: esreveR (Tesztalany370, asdfg13)
description:
People are making their world worse and worse, you have to stop them! But the only one who could control them lived before everything else.

You have to go back to the beginning of time to remove Gaia, who is nurturing people, and revive Chaos.

Because time goes backwards, people's death is reversed too, so you will meet some undead!

Can you navigate the reversed world, and lengthen your life before Gaia's?

(Spoiler: you can't, because the game is incomplete)
